actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide cost-of-living increases in the supplemental payments authorized by section 4, Public Law 92-425.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Defense to make cost-of-living increases in the annuity payments authorized by Federal law to Military personnel based upon a formula specified in this Act. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1401(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide cost-of-living increases in the supplemental payments authorized by section 4, Public Law 92-425.
